sqlMap.select: select * from fund where fund.fund_name like #fundName#
sqlMap.insert:
insert into fund (fund_name, phone_number, contact, priority) value (#fundName#, #phoneNumber#, #contactor#, #priority#)
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
sqlMap.update: update fund set fund_name = #fundName#, phone_number = #phoneNumber#, contact = #contactor#, priority = #priority# where id = #id#
sqlMap.insert: insert into small_meeting_request (fund_id, company_id, musthave, small) value (#fundId#, #companyId#, #musthave#, #small#)
sqlMap.select:
select fund_name, name, fund.id as fundid, company.id as companyid, musthave, small from one_on_one_meeting_request left join fund on one_on_one_meeting_request.fund_id = fund.id left join company on one_on_one_meeting_request.company_id = company.id where fund.id = #fundid#
union
select fund_name, name, fund.id as fundid, company.id as companyid, musthave, small from small_meeting_request left join fund on small_meeting_request.fund_id = fund.id left join company on small_meeting_request.company_id = company.id where fund.id = #fundid#

SELECT fund.fund_name, company.name, time_frame.time_window, 11mr.status, 11mr.time_frame_id, '1on1' as meetingtype FROM (((SELECT * FROM one_on_one_meeting_request WHERE fund_id=#fundid#) as 11mr INNER JOIN fund ON 11mr.fund_id = fund.id) INNER JOIN company ON 11mr.company_id = company.id) INNER JOIN time_frame ON 11mr.time_frame_id = time_frame.id
UNION
SELECT fund.fund_name, company.name, time_frame.time_window, smmr.status, smmr.time_frame_id, 'small' as meetingtype FROM (((SELECT * FROM small_meeting_request WHERE fund_id=#fundid#) as smmr INNER JOIN fund ON smmr.fund_id = fund.id) INNER JOIN company ON smmr.company_id = company.id) INNER JOIN time_frame ON smmr.time_frame_id = time_frame.id
ORDER BY time_frame_id ASC;
